summary: During World War II, an American destroyer meets a German U-Boat. Both captains are experts, and so begins a deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

keywords: u boat|german submarine|u.s. navy|naval battle|submarine crew
title: Duelo en el Atlántico Norte
